name: Science Fiction Characters - Personality Matching Game
name_original: Science Fiction Characters - Personality Matching Game
description:
• Science Fiction Characters •

Science Fiction Characters game will test your personality the hard way, despite its simple design. Your goal is to answer a series of questions to find out what popular TV series character you are.
Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- One touch controls
- Choose the answer you like most
- Tons of popular characters
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master

Which Fantasy/SciFi Character Are You ?

- Lots of fun
- Nice graphics
- Addicting gameplay
- Clear and simple UI
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
